author: umagesh
msg: Merge manifests option was not working earlier.  This patch creates a merged manifest properly though the resultant jar will be unreadable using JarInputStream.  However, if user does not choose to merge manifests, the created jar will be readable by JarInputStream.  This is a "For Now" fix.

author: bodewig
msg: Don't extend MatchingTask for no reason.
